media:group.media:title: This Pro Name is ILLEGAL?!
media:group.media:description:
#shorts #gaming #esports
In esports, you can name yourself literally anything...

entry.title: Who Is Going To Win Worlds?

media:group.media:title: Who Is Going To Win Worlds?
media:group.media:description:
Sponsored by @Cisco - powering the future of esports. Learn more at: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/industries/sports-entertainment/esports.html
Welcome to the 4th and final episode of Rank Up, Ping Down, brought to you by Cisco!
This week Dimitri is joined by our very own Danny Burke, who will try to help him get out of gold while they discuss the happenings of Worlds 2022, the upcoming Worlds Final and why Yuumi shouldn't be in the game.
Produced & Hosted by: Dimitri Pascaluta (@DPascaluta) Produced by: Keith Capstick (@KeithCapstick) & Miles Hackett (@miles_hackett) Edited by: Brendan Fahey (@_drillbit), Kai Medalla (@dinonotdeenoh) and Andrew Faigal (@Brrrning) Graphics by: William O'keefe (@MagooMagoof) & Bennett Grainger
Music used under license from Associated Production Music LLC (”APM”).

entry.title: It Costs HOW MUCH To Make a FUT Team??

media:group.media:title: It Costs HOW MUCH To Make a FUT Team??
media:group.media:description:
#shorts #gaming #esports
Other than the fact that it’s arguably the same game repackaged every year, FIFA’s online component Ultimate Team continues to be a predatory cash grab.
But how much does it cost to make a team that’s actually good?
Writen and hosted by: Devin Coull Edited by: Rotimi Adelakun Produced by: Kai Medalla
Music used under license from Associated Production Music LLC (”APM”).

entry.title: Delete Yuumi? *LIVE* w/ Rush at the Worlds Finals Fan Fest | Presented by Cisco

media:group.media:title: Delete Yuumi? *LIVE* w/ Rush at the Worlds Finals Fan Fest | Presented by Cisco
Can Faker Actually Do It?
media:group.media:description:
Guys, Faker is one series away from another Worlds title - 6 years after his last.
But to win it all this weekend he has to get past Deft - the only player in the world who might have more of an anime story right now than he does.
I cannot wait.
Written & Hosted by: Danny Burke (@lurkeyburke) Edited by: Sam Gore Thumbnail by: Bennett Grainger Produced by: Danny Burke (@lurkeyburke) & Danielle Rosen (@Daniel_Rosen)
Footage Courtesy: https://pastebin.com/1RNdjzHq

media:group.media:title: Everyone Is Angry
media:group.media:description:
It’s another year so that means we got another Call of Duty. And as always its launch has sparked another debate around skill based matchmaking.
There has been lots of discourse coming from both sides and a ton of CoD streamers including Doc and Courage have come out against Activision's choice to include it.
Now are CoD fans just upset that they actually have to try or are the complaints actually warranted?
Written & Hosted by: Devil Coull (@Fake_DevinCoull) Edited by: Brendan Fahey (@Drillbit_) Produced by: Danny Burke (@lurkeyburke)
Footage courtesy of: https://pastebin.com/GewpJdMd
Music used under license from Associated Production Music LLC (”APM”).

media:group.media:title: The Deadliest Players in Esports
media:group.media:description:
There are a ton of different ways to measure a pro’s greatness in their esport. But at the end of the day, these players really only have one job to do. Today, we are paying our respects to the heroes who get down and dirty - the deadliest players in esports.
Written by: Devin Coull (@Fake_DevinCoull) Edited by: Brendan Fahey (@Drillbit_) & Andrew Faigal (@Brrrning) Hosted by: Elisabeth Marchini (@ejmarchini) Produced by: Brendan Fahey (@Drillbit_) & Danielle Rosen (@Daniel_Rosen)
